$comment: NOTE: GitHub MCP server tools (repo operations, issues, PRs) are built-in to Copilot and do not need configuration here. The COPILOT_MCP_GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN secret is NOT used for MCP - it's reserved for other GitHub API integrations. GitHub MCP uses OAuth through Copilot's built-in authentication.

context7.description: Pulls up-to-date, version-specific documentation and code examples directly from the source. Provides accurate, relevant documentation with no hallucinations for better AI understanding of your stack. Useful for looking up Python 3.13+, Playwright, Flask, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, pytest, and other framework documentation.

openai-websearch.description: Enables web search capabilities through OpenAI. Use for finding current information about job boards, scraping techniques, Python libraries, security best practices, and emerging trends in job automation.

fetch.description: Fetches web content for analysis. Useful for inspecting job board HTML structures, checking robots.txt files, and analyzing scraping targets before implementing scrapers.

playwright.description: Browser automation capabilities for testing and development. Use for interactive debugging of scrapers, testing JavaScript-heavy job boards, and validating web UI functionality.
